verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,-rāmānanda, kaha vicāriyā
rājāke milite yuyāya sannyāsī hañā?

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; rāmānanda—My dear Rāmānanda; kaha—please ask Me; vicāriyā—after due consideration; rājāke—the King; milite—to meet; yuyāya—is it befitting; sannyāsī—in the renounced order of life; hañā—being.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "My dear Rāmānanda, you should make this request after duly considering whether it is befitting for a sannyāsī to meet a king.
